verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> again to me, saying,<WH559>
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> and say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Howl<WH3213> you, Woe<WH1929> worth the day!<WH3117>
For the day<WH3117> is near,<WH7138> even the day<WH3117> of the LORD<WH3068> is near,<WH7138> a cloudy<WH6051> day;<WH3117> it shall be the time<WH6256> of the heathen.<WH1471>

And the sword<WH2719> shall come<WH935> on Egypt,<WH4714> and great pain<WH2479> shall be in Ethiopia,<WH3568> when the slain<WH2491> shall fall<WH5307> in Egypt,<WH4714> and they shall take<WH3947> away her multitude,<WH1995> and her foundations<WH3247> shall be broken<WH2040> down.<WH2040>

Ethiopia,<WH3568> and Libya,<WH3864> and Lydia,<WH3865> and all<WH3605> the mingled<WH6154> people, and Chub,<WH3552> and the men<WH1121> of the land<WH776> that is in league,<WH1285> shall fall<WH5307> with them by the sword.<WH2719>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> They also that uphold<WH5564> Egypt<WH4714> shall fall;<WH5307> and the pride<WH1347> of her power<WH5797> shall come<WH3381> down:<WH3381> from the tower<WH4024> of Syene<WH5482> shall they fall<WH5307> in it by the sword,<WH2719> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

And they shall be desolate<WH8074> in the middle<WH8432> of the countries<WH776> that are desolate,<WH8074> and her cities<WH5892> shall be in the middle<WH8432> of the cities<WH5892> that are wasted.<WH2717>
And they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when I have set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Egypt,<WH4714> and when all<WH3605> her helpers<WH5826> shall be destroyed.<WH7665>

In that day<WH3117> shall messengers<WH4397> go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from me in ships<WH6716> to make the careless<WH983> Ethiopians<WH3569> afraid,<WH2729> and great pain<WH2479> shall come<WH1961> on them, as in the day<WH3117> of Egypt:<WH4714> for, see,<WH2009> it comes.<WH935>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> I will also make the multitude<WH1995> of Egypt<WH4714> to cease<WH7673> by the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>

He and his people<WH5971> with him, the terrible<WH6184> of the nations,<WH1471> shall be brought<WH935> to destroy<WH7843> the land:<WH776> and they shall draw<WH7324> their swords<WH2719> against<WH5921> Egypt,<WH4714> and fill<WH4390> the land<WH776> with the slain.<WH2491>

And I will make the rivers<WH2975> dry,<WH2724> and sell<WH4376> the land<WH776> into the hand<WH3027> of the wicked:<WH7451> and I will make the land<WH776> waste,<WH8074> and all<WH4393> that is therein,<WH4393> by the hand<WH3027> of strangers:<WH2114> I the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> I will also destroy<WH6> the idols,<WH1544> and I will cause their images<WH457> to cease<WH7673> out of Noph;<WH5297> and there shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> a prince<WH5387> of the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> and I will put<WH5414> a fear<WH3374> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
And I will make Pathros<WH6624> desolate,<WH8074> and will set<WH5414> fire<WH784> in Zoan,<WH6814> and will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in No.<WH4996>
And I will pour<WH8210> my fury<WH2534> on Sin,<WH5512> the strength<WH4581> of Egypt;<WH4714> and I will cut<WH3772> off the multitude<WH1995> of No.<WH4996>

And I will set<WH5414> fire<WH784> in Egypt:<WH4714> Sin<WH5512> shall have great<WH2342> pain,<WH2342> and No<WH4996> shall be rent<WH1234> asunder, and Noph<WH5297> shall have distresses<WH6862> daily.<WH3119>
The young<WH970> men of Aven<WH206> and of Pibeseth<WH6364> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword:<WH2719> and these<WH2007> cities shall go<WH3212> into captivity.<WH7628>

At Tehaphnehes<WH8471> also the day<WH3117> shall be darkened,<WH2821> when I shall break<WH7665> there<WH8033> the yokes<WH4133> of Egypt:<WH4714> and the pomp<WH1347> of her strength<WH5797> shall cease<WH7673> in her: as for her, a cloud<WH6051> shall cover<WH3680> her, and her daughters<WH1323> shall go<WH3212> into captivity.<WH7628>
Thus will I execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in Egypt:<WH4714> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

And it came<WH1961> to pass in the eleventh<WH259> <WH6240> year,<WH8141> in the first<WH7223> month,<WH2320> in the seventh<WH7651> day of the month,<WH2320> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> I have broken<WH7665> the arm<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt;<WH4714> and, see,<WH2009> it shall not be bound<WH2280> up to be healed,<WH5414> <WH7499> to put<WH7760> a roller<WH2848> to bind<WH2280> it, to make it strong<WH2388> to hold<WH8610> the sword.<WH2719>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I am against<WH413> Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and will break<WH7665> his arms,<WH2220> the strong,<WH2389> and that which was broken;<WH7665> and I will cause the sword<WH2719> to fall<WH5307> out of his hand.<WH3027>
And I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations,<WH1471> and will disperse<WH2219> them through the countries.<WH776>

And I will strengthen<WH2388> the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and put<WH5414> my sword<WH2719> in his hand:<WH3027> but I will break<WH7665> Pharaoh's<WH6547> arms,<WH2220> and he shall groan<WH5008> before<WH6440> him with the groanings<WH5009> of a deadly wounded<WH2491> man.

But I will strengthen<WH2388> the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and the arms<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> shall fall<WH5307> down; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when I shall put<WH5414> my sword<WH2719> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and he shall stretch<WH5186> it out on the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
And I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations,<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> them among the countries;<WH776> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>
